chunk_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care
final_prompt: Summarize this discussion focusing on the main points related to: symptoms, warning signs, medical emergency, urgent care

sentences.text: if you notice a red spot on one breast that isn’t going away, if you have new orange-peel-like dimpling on one breast, or one breast appears swollen, any of those can be a sign of inflammatory breast cancer.
that’s a particularly aggressive form of breast cancer that’s usually only found in more advanced stages.
you usually don’t have a lump.
in my case it turned out to be a brain tumor.
i waited too long and now my vision loss is permanent.
but i went early enough to still be alive.
a migraine that's much more painful than usual.
apparently a stroke is not always accompanied by the other well known symptoms.

chunks.raw_summary: If you notice a red spot on one breast that isn’t going away, if you have new orange-peel-like dimpling, or one breast appears swollen, any of those can be a sign of inflammatory breast cancer .
chunks.cleaned_summary: If you notice a red spot on one breast that isn’t going away, if you have new orange-peel-like dimpling, or one breast appears swollen, any of those can be a sign of inflammatory breast cancer.
